level.heading: Disposition of forfeitures.
level.text: Forfeitures in the Teacher's Retirement Fund shall not be applied to increase the annuity of a person hereunder, but rather, shall be applied to pay administrative expenses, if and as directed by the District of Columbia Retirement Board, or used to reduce the District's contributions.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-312 added this section.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: Section 2(j) of D.C. Law 19-313 added this section.
Section 4(b) of D.C. Law 19-313 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
